you can try making a new apply dead

[code] /* public boolean funpk() {
if (IsDeadTimer == true) {
if (Retribution == true) {
animation(437,absY,absX);
attackPlayersPrayer(5, 15);
}
actionAmount++;
actionTimer = 14;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
setAnimation(0x900);

IsDeadTimer = true;

}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == false) {
//teleportToX = 3094;
//teleportToY = 3478;

//frame1(); // Mod Allstar: Resets animation
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;

 updateRequired = true;
 appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 
 }
 return true;
 }[/code]

item.title: Need help,
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Need help, im adding funpk and i froze when i died,

here my applykilled boolean’s and this other shit,

what i edit?

[code] /* public boolean ApplyDead() {
if (IsDeadTimer == true) {
if (Retribution == true) {
animation(437,absY,absX);
attackPlayersPrayer(5, 15);
}
actionAmount++;
actionTimer = 14;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
setAnimation(0x900);
pEmote = 2304;
IsDeadTimer = true;
ApplyDead();
}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == false) {
PKz();
keepItem1();
keepItem2();
keepItem3();
deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
youdied();
//teleportToX = 3094;
//teleportToY = 3478;
//IsDeadTeleporting = true;
//frame1(); // Mod Allstar: Resets animation
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
if(keepItem != 0)
addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
if(keepItem2 != 0)
addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
if(keepItem3 != 0)
addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

 resetKeepItem();
 updateRequired = true;
 appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 
 }
 return true;
 }*/
public boolean ApplyDead() {
    if (IsDeadTimer == true) {
        actionAmount++;
        actionTimer = 0;
        ResetAttack();
        ResetAttackNPC();
        pEmote = 2304;
        IsDeadTimer = true;
        ApplyDead();
        specialAttacks();
        specialAttacks2();
        specialAttacks3();
        specialAttacks4();
        specialAttacks5();
        specialAttacks6();
    }
    if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == false) {
        keepItem1();
        keepItem2();
        keepItem3();
        deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
        deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
        deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
        youdied();
        PKz();
        teleportToX = 3363;
        teleportToY = 9638;
        IsDeadTeleporting = true;
        frame1(); // Mod Allstar: Resets animation
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
                playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
        refreshSkills();
        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
        KillerId = playerId;
        if (keepItem != 0) {
            addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
        }
        if (keepItem2 != 0) {
            addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
        }
        if (keepItem3 != 0) {
            addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);
        }

        resetKeepItem();
                    
    }
    return true;
}

public boolean ApplyDeadz() {

    if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
        actionTimer = 0;
        ResetAttack();
        ResetAttackNPC();
        setAnimation(2304);
        IsDeadTeleporting = true;
        IsDeadTimer = true;
        ApplyDead();
        specialAttacks();
        specialAttacks2();
        specialAttacks3();
        specialAttacks4();
        specialAttacks5();
        specialAttacks6();
    }
    if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {

        PKz();
                   
        CheckDrop();

        ApplyRingz();

        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
                playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
        refreshSkills();
        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
        KillerId = playerId;
        if (keepItem != 0) {
            addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
        }
        if (keepItem2 != 0) {
            addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
        }
        if (keepItem3 != 0) {
            addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);
        }

        resetKeepItem();
                    
    }
    return true;
}

[/code]

Read full topic
